abstracts.cdata!:
The Livestock Project for Congo will
            finance: (A) Establishment of a 30,000 ha ranch in the
            Dihesse plain, located in the loop of the Niari River,
            including the construction of fencing, water points, housing
            and other buildings and related facilities; the
            establishment of improved pastures; and the development on
            the ranch of a herd of about 35,000 head of beef cattle,
            principally of the N'dama breed; (B) Carrying out of
            applied research and trials on pasture establishment and
            utilization, animal husbandry, ranch management and the
            collection of data, and the development of techniques needed
            to support further livestock development by the Borrower;
            and (C) Training of staff of ORD in ranch management,
            including the training of counterparts.
